attributes.additional_details: We ask that support is given to Dartford Valley Rugby Football Club to be permitted to change its name to Dartford Rugby Football Club, overturning resistance to the name change from Dartford Borough Council, Kent RFU and other clubs that are NOT located in the Borough of Dartford. We are the ONLY rugby club in Dartford and must be recognised as such in order to flourish in the sport and in the local community, We believe that we have a great deal to contribute to the improvement of society in Dartford regardless of sex, age, ability and ethnic group.
